thread.title: It's time for logistics to 'Uberize,' say industry experts
thread.title_full: It's time for logistics to 'Uberize,' say industry experts

author: Reynolds Hutchins, Associate Editor
title: It's time for logistics to 'Uberize,' say industry experts
text: - A + A It's time for logistics to 'Uberize,' say industry experts When it comes to the business of moving goods from one point to another, there’s one firm that insiders say is shaking up the logistics industry — and it’s not even in logistics.
